privacyPolicy.pageSubtitle: Learn how we handle your data to keep your experience safe and private.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy outlines how our mobile application collects, uses, and protects your information when you interact with our app. By using the app, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: Our app may request access to certain features on your device that are necessary for its core functionality.

sections.title: 3. Camera Permission
sections.content:
We require CAMERA permission to enable key features of the app. This includes:

- Capturing photos and/or videos within the app
- Processing image data for visual-based functionality

This access is solely for the features provided within the app and is not used beyond its intended purpose.

sections.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
sections.content:
The camera data is used **only** within the app for functional purposes. Specifically:

- Camera data is processed locally on your device
- We do **not** collect, transmit, or store your photos or videos on our servers unless you explicitly choose to upload or share them
- Camera data is **not** used for advertising, marketing, or analytics

Your privacy is central to our app experience.

sections.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
sections.content:
- All media (photos/videos) captured within the app are stored locally on your device
- We implement reasonable security practices to help protect any in-app data processing
- We do **not** sell, rent, or trade your personal information with third parties

sections.title: 6. Your Choices
sections.content:
You have full control over your data:

- You can **deny or revoke** camera permissions at any time via your device settings
- You may **delete any media** captured through the app using your device's file manager

The app's functionality may be limited without camera access, but it will remain secure and respectful of your choices.

sections.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review the policy regularly for any changes.

sections.title: 8. Contact Us
sections.content:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: info@usetrislovensko.sk
Website: usetrislovensko.sk

sections.title: Effective Date
sections.content: This policy is effective as of April 16, 2025.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Ušetri Slovensko. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.contactDescription: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our friendly support team is here to help.

q1.question: What is Ušetri Slovensko?
q1.answer: Ušetri Slovensko is a price comparison app that helps you save money on groceries by comparing prices across multiple supermarkets in Slovakia. We provide real-time price data to help you find the best deals on the products you need.

q2.question: How does price comparison work?
q2.answer: Our system automatically collects and updates price data from major supermarkets across Slovakia. When you search for a product, we show you current prices from different stores, allowing you to choose where to shop for the best value.

q3.question: Which supermarkets do you cover?
q3.answer: We are currently covering Tesco, Billa, Kaufland, and Lidl in the Bratislava region. We're continuously working to expand our coverage to include more retailers and regions.

q4.question: How often are prices updated?
q4.answer: Our prices are checked and updated weekly to ensure you have current pricing information. However, prices may change in-store between updates, and we recommend verifying prices at checkout.

q1.question: How do I create a shopping list?
q1.answer: Simply search for products you want to buy and add them to your shopping list. The app will automatically calculate which stores offer the best prices for your entire list, helping you save money and time.

q2.question: Can I get notifications for price drops?
q2.answer: Yes! With our Deal Alerts feature, you can add products to your watchlist and receive notifications when they go on sale or their prices drop significantly.

q3.question: How do I view price history?
q3.answer: Each product page includes a price history chart showing how prices have changed over time. This helps you identify trends and make informed decisions about when to buy.

q4.question: Is the app available offline?
q4.answer: While you need an internet connection to get the latest prices, you can view your saved shopping lists and previously loaded product information offline.

q1.question: Is the app free to use?
q1.answer: The app is free for checking a limited amount of products. This allows you to try out our service and see the value we provide before upgrading.

q2.question: What additional features does Premium offer?
q2.answer: Premium version includes unlimited search, shopping list functionality, longer price history, and discount notifications. These features help you maximize your savings and manage your shopping more effectively.

q3.question: How much does Premium cost?
q3.answer: Our Premium subscription is competitively priced to provide excellent value. Visit our Premium page for current pricing and subscription options. We often offer special promotions for new users.

q1.question: Which devices are supported?
q1.answer: Our app is available for both iOS and Android mobile devices. We focus on providing the best mobile experience for price comparison on the go.

q2.question: I'm having trouble with the app. What should I do?
q2.answer: First, try restarting the app or checking your internet connection. If the problem persists, please contact us with details about your device and the issue you're experiencing.

q3.question: How do I update the app?
q3.answer: Updates are available through the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android). We recommend enabling automatic updates to ensure you always have the latest features and bug fixes.
